definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (fortunatus? perh. der. fr. foreg. divine name Siegf:JPTh 1875, 364 Sta:Gesch. i. 148; but v. also Bae:Rel 159 f.)—[[שׇגּד]] Ge 35:26 +, as well as [[גׇּדָ]] Ge 30:11 +;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: strictly as personal name Ge 30:11, Ge 35:26, Ge 46:16, Ex 1:4 cf. Ge 49:19, 1Ch 2:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as name of tribe Nu 1:14, De 27:13, De 33:20, De 33:20, Jos 18:7, Ez Eze 48:27, Eze 48:28; cf. [[אֶרֶץ גׇּד]] 1Sa 13:7 v. also Je 49:1, [[שַׁעַד גׇּד]] Ez Eze 48:34, on [[הַנַּחַל]] [[הַגׇּד]] 2Sa 24:5 cf. We Dr; explicitly [[מַטֵּה גׇּד]] Nu 1:25, Nu 2:14, Nu 13:15, Jos 13:24, Jos 20:8, Jos 21:7, Jos 21:36, 1Ch 6:48, 1Ch 6:65; once, [[חְבָא מַטֵּה בְנֵי־גׇד]] Nu 10:20; [[בְּנֵי גׇד]] (MI:10 [[אש גד]]) Nu 1:24 + 12 t. Nu; Jos 4:12 + 14 t. Jos; 1Ch 5:11, 1Ch 12:14. †
a prophet in David's time, called [[נׇבִיא]] 1Sa 22:5, but [[הַנׇּבִיא חׂזֶה דָוִד]] 2Sa 24:11 & [[חׂזֵה]] [[הַחׂזֶה]] ‖ 1Ch 21:9,   1Ch 29:29 & [[חׂזֵה־הַמֶּלֶךָ]] 2Ch 29:25.
